translation.en: Where are you taking me?
Where are you taking me?
[female over intercom] Fimbra Control, Alouette 5 is in range.
Apply the blindfold, please.
Blindfold?
Hell, no! No way!
This enforced incarceration is unsanctioned, unwarranted,
translation.ko: 이런 강제 감금은 불법이고, 부당하며 헌법에 위배되는 행동입니다!

translation.en: and unconstitutional!
-What the fuck are you doing? -[system dings]
Who is flying this thing?
Fimbra Control, remote landing sequence has begun.
translation.ko: 핌브라 컨트롤 원격 착륙 시퀀스가 시작됐다

translation.en: Hey, hey, man! Hey!
Where are you taking me?
What is this? [man] In due time, Professor Clark.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 겁니까? - 때를 기다리시게, 클라크 교수

translation.en: No, the time is due. Now is the due time. Are you gonna kill me?
I'm not scared or nothing. I'm just curious.
[man 2] Well, according to the world, Professor Clark, you're already dead.
translation.ko: 세상의 관점에서 보면 당신은 이미 죽었어

translation.en: Who are you?
[in Australian accent] Bruce Baldwin.
[in New York accent] Shep Gordon.
[in Russian accent] I am the one they call Mishu.
[in British accent] And I am Lord Lordington.
Together, we are…
[all] The Pentaverate.
[narrator] In 1347, five learned men realized
that the black plague was caused by fleas on rats.
translation.ko: 흑사병의 원인이 쥐에 기생하는 벼룩임을 알아냈다

translation.en: However, the Church believed the plague to be God's punishment,
translation.ko: 하지만 교회는 흑사병을 신의 심판이라 여겼으며

translation.en: labeling these five men heretics.
So they formed a benevolent secret society to influence world events, known as
translation.ko: 이에 5인은 세계사에 선한 영향력을 행사하기 위해 비밀결사대를 조직하였으니 이름하여…

translation.en: The Pentaverate.
Throughout the centuries, there have been many secret organizations.
translation.ko: 인류의 역사 속에는 수많은 비밀 조직이 존재했으나

translation.en: What makes the Pentaverate different?
They're nice.
-[upbeat music playing] -[man] You're watching CACA Toronto.
translation.ko: CACA 토론토와 함께하고 계십니다 "CACA 뉴스 토론토"

translation.en: Welcome back. I'm Darleen Windelchuck.
Hard-hitting and breaking now,
nuclear physicist Professor Hobart Clark has died of an apparent broken neck.
translation.ko: 핵물리학자 호바트 클라크 교수가 목이 부러져 사망했습니다 "과학자 클라크 사망"

translation.en: Oakland Police say Clark died attempting the "kiss the star" challenge,
translation.ko: 클라크는 '키스 더 스타' 챌린지를 수행하던 도중 사망했는데요 "목 골절, '키싱 스타'"

translation.en: the latest Internet craze, where people are challenged to kiss their own anus.
translation.ko: 자기 항문에 입맞춤을 하는 최근 인터넷 열풍이라고 하죠 "사인은 항문 키스"

translation.en: Professor Clark was 57.
And finally, a report from Canada's own lovable Ken Scarborough.
translation.ko: 드디어 캐나다가 사랑하는 리포터 켄 스카버러를 만날 시간입니다 "켄의 토론토 드디어… 켄이 왔어요"

translation.en: Ken Scarborough here at the Toronto Sportsman Show.
translation.ko: 토론토 스포츠맨 쇼에 나와 있는 켄 스카버러입니다

translation.en: There's plenty of things to do, whether you're into skeet-shooting…
translation.ko: 체험할 거리가 많은 곳이죠 스키트 사격도 있고

translation.en: …or fly-fishing.
Over there's a 1,000-pound bull made entirely out of butter.
We asked some Torontonians what they thought of this year's Sportsman Show.
translation.ko: 올해 쇼는 어땠는지 토론토 시민들에게 물어봤습니다

translation.en: Hey, buddy, why don't you take off your clothes and bear with me?
translation.ko: 친구, 내가 옷 벗을 테니까 '베어' 먹지 말아 줄래?

translation.en: What's your favorite part about this year's Sportsman Show?
translation.ko: 올해 스포츠맨 쇼에서 가장 맘에 드는 부분이 뭐죠?

translation.en: Oh my God, you're Ken Scarborough. Yes, I am.
You're still alive?
I certainly am.
But you must be, like, 100 years old?
You're lucky I don't…
Not tonight, deer. I've got a headache!
I haven't had this much fun since I was at a nudist colony
and accidentally backed into a meat thermometer.
translation.ko: 육류용 온도계에 뒤쪽을 찔린 후로 처음이군요

translation.en: But wherever you go at the Sportsman Show,
you're never too far from a couple of lovely ladies.
translation.ko: 어딜 가든 두 미녀가 나와 함께한다는 겁니다

translation.en: Ken Scarborough, CACA News.
From all of us at CACA Toronto News, good night, and do your best, eh?
translation.ko: 오늘 CACA 토론토 뉴스는 이만 마치겠습니다 화끈한 밤 되세요

translation.en: [man] Up next, Canada's favorite quiz show, Close Enough,
translation.ko: 다음은 캐나다의 최애 퀴즈 쇼 '대충 맞혀'입니다

translation.en: where to win, you only have to be…
[man and audience] Close enough!
And we're clear!
Nice job. See you tomorrow. Great job. See you tomorrow.
Mrs. Snee, what did you think of my piece tonight?
Ken, we should talk. It's about time we talk about your future.
translation.ko: 켄, 얘기 좀 하죠 미래를 논할 때가 됐어요

translation.en: Could be a slow process. Keep it just between us.
translation.ko: 더딘 과정이 될 것 같으니까 둘만의 비밀로 하죠

translation.en: What are you saying, boss? Good luck with the retirement, Ken.
translation.ko: - 그게 무슨 말씀이세요? - 은퇴 잘해요, 켄

translation.en: Ah, jumpin' German Jesus, Darleen. I was working up to it!
translation.ko: 예수님 낮술 마시는 소리 하네 달린, 돌려 말하고 있었잖아요

translation.en: Are you giving me the old heave-ho?
I don't wanna be a shit heel, Ken,
but man-on-the-street opinions come from Twitter now!
You're a nice guy. Jeez.
You've even been on the cover of Canadian Nice Magazine.
But this show needs big stories. Hard-hitting news!
translation.ko: 우리한텐 빅뉴스가 필요해요 골 때리는 뉴스 말이에요!

translation.en: Hard-hitting?
Well, tomorrow, I'm covering the Canadian Conspiracy Convention.
translation.ko: 내일은 캐나다 음모론 컨벤션을 취재하는 날이에요

translation.en: You know? CanConCon.
You know, retirement would be the perfect time for you to travel.
translation.ko: 켄, 은퇴하고 나서 여행 가면 딱이겠네요!

translation.en: I don't want to travel!
I want to stay right here in Toronto, giving voice to the common man.
translation.ko: 여기 토론토에 살면서 시민들에게 소식을 전할래요

translation.en: Mrs. Snee, this job is all I have left in the whole world.
translation.ko: 스니 씨, 제게 남은 건 이 일밖에 없어요

translation.en: Please,
give me one more chance.
Okay, I'll give you one more shot. Jeez!
translation.ko: 알겠어요 딱 한 번만 줄게요, 거참!

translation.en: Oh, but, Ken… [sighs]
…if you can't come up with a hard-hitting piece,
I'm sorry.
[gasps] I'm sorry you're sorry, frankly.
If you're sorry, you're gonna make me sorry.
Sorry.
Hey!
Aw, Darleen told me you're getting canceled, eh?
Yeah, telephone, telegraph, tell-Darleen.
translation.ko: 역시, 세상에 전화기가 있다면 방송국엔 달린이 있죠

translation.en: Big mouth.
I can't believe it.
This job's all I've ever wanted to do.
Maybe you're destined for something greater.
I don't think I believe in that destiny junk.
I know we haven't worked together long, but I believe in you.
translation.ko: 같이 일한 지 얼마 안 됐지만 난 켄을 믿어요

translation.en: You're a good person. You're kind. The work you do matters.
translation.ko: 켄은 좋은 사람이에요 착하고, 의미 있는 일을 하죠

translation.en: You're my mentor. [chuckles] Kind of remind me of my dad.
translation.ko: 제 멘토세요 켄을 보면 아빠가 생각나요

translation.en: Aw, thanks.
Except you don't drink, and you didn't leave my mom for some hosebag.
translation.ko: 쓰레기 같은 여자 때문에 엄마를 버린 주정뱅이지만요

translation.en: Okey dokey.
Let's go find a big story, eh? I know we can find it at CanConCon.
translation.ko: 특종을 찾으러 가볼까요? 캔콘콘에 가면 찾을 수 있어요

translation.en: [sighs] I hope so, Reilly.
It's just this conspiracy theory stuff sounds like a load of balloon juice to me.
Ugh! Believe! All right, I'm believing.
-[Reilly] Maybe we'll catch Bigfoot! -[Ken] That'd be nice.
Congratulations.
You've just been kidnapped
into the world's oldest and most effective secret society.
translation.ko: 세계에서 가장 오래되고 가장 효율적인 비밀 단체입니다

translation.en: The Pentaverate.
I'm Rob Lowe.
Thank you.
The Pentaverate is a benevolent, fully sequestered secret society
of five men, who, since 1347, have been experts in their fields.
Men like Leonardo da Vinci,
Jonas Salk,
and the Quaker Oats guy.
The current Pentaverate consists of Lord Lordington,
translation.ko: 현 펜타버릿 대원을 소개합니다 최고위 서열인 로딩턴 경

translation.en: our highest-ranking member,
former Australian media mogul Bruce Baldwin,
ex-member of Putin's oligarchy Mishu Ivanov,
translation.ko: 푸틴의 최측근 인사 출신 미슈 이바노프

translation.en: Alice Cooper's former manager, the legendary Shep Gordon,
translation.ko: 앨리스 쿠퍼의 전 매니저이자 전설의 사나이 솁 고든

translation.en: and you.
We pay our respects to your predecessor, who died two days ago, Jason Eccleston,
translation.ko: 이틀 전에 돌아가신 전임자에게 조의를 표합니다 제이슨 에클스턴

translation.en: the tech genius who invented our supercomputer, MENTOR.
A little bit about myself.
I'm in a polyamorous relationship with two life-sized companion dolls.
translation.ko: 실물 크기 반려 인형 두 개와 폴리아모리 관계를 유지 중이고

translation.en: I also do up close sex magic.
I both read and masturbate to tarot.
God, is… is this for real?
I know what you're asking yourself. "Is this for real?"
The answer is, yes!
You may also be asking, "When do I start running the world?"
translation.ko: 또 묻고 계실 겁니다 '난 언제부터 세상을 주무르지?'

translation.en: Well, let's try walking the world first.
translation.ko: 세상을 주무르려면 먼저 만져야 하지 않을까요?

translation.en: And as for me, well, I'm not in the Pentaverate.
I'm just an actor who will have his memory wiped after this video…
translation.ko: 평범한 배우일 뿐이며 촬영이 끝나면 기억을 지울…

translation.en: -What? -[electronic zaps]
Welcome aboard. We're happy to have you!
And remember, the Pentaverate must never be exposed.
translation.ko: 명심하세요, 펜타버릿은 절대 노출돼선 안 됩니다

translation.en: [all together] The Pentaverate must never be exposed.
Tell Rob he did a great job.
So you're telling me I'm now a member
of a secret organization called the Pentaverate?
Was this not clear?
Yeah, okay. I'm out.
[Lordington] I'm afraid that's not possible, Professor.
You see, your death was faked in the real world.
translation.ko: 자네가 현실에서 겪은 죽음은 연출된 죽음이었어

translation.en: Okay, then, so how'd I die?
I will say this. It was memorable.
translation.ko: 이거 하나는 확실해 잊지 못할 거야

translation.en: We've all had our deaths faked. I died from an unprovoked shark attack.
translation.ko: 우린 모두 죽음을 위장했어 난 갑작스러운 상어 공격에 당했지

translation.en: Is there such a thing as a provoked shark attack?
Like you're standing by the seaside going, "You bastard prick shark, come get me!"
translation.ko: 해변에서 이렇게 외치면 돼? '염병할 상어 자식, 날 덮쳐!'

translation.en: Wait a sec. How are you gonna call yourselves benevolent
if you're gonna let this bullshit-slinging hate-monger walk around?
translation.ko: 개소리로 사람 신경 긁는 저놈은 왜 데리고 있죠?

translation.en: Uh, because sometimes you need thief to catch thief.
translation.ko: 때로 도둑을 잡으려면 도둑이 필요한 법이지

translation.en: Wolf to catch wolf. Anteater to catch ant--
-Uh, thank you, Mishu. Thank you. -Okay.
Bruce invented the tricks of media distortion that the evil wealthy use.
translation.ko: 브루스는 악한 부자들이 애용하는 언론의 왜곡을 발명했지만

translation.en: He's somewhat of a reformed character now. The Pentaverate will do that to you.
This ain't right. I'm a nuclear scientist.
I was two years away from cracking cold fusion!
Oh, come on, Professor. It was always "two more years."
It was never gonna happen.
You can do more good here.
I'm Patty, executive assistant to the Pentaverate Five.
Patty, you don't need to say "Pentaverate Five."
"Pentaverate" is five.
[Shep] It's like saying "ATM machine."
The "M" is "machine."
So, basically, you'd be saying "automated teller machine machine."
translation.ko: '현금 자동 입출금 기계 기계'라고 말하는 셈이라고

translation.en: Thanks for the mansplain-ation, Shep.
Enough about me.
I'll talk about me!
I'm from Massapequa, Long Island.
I like to call it Matzo-Pizza,
'cause it's half-Italian, half-Jewish.
Matzo-Pizza. Isn't that cute?
-[chuckles] -Thank you.
Listen, you're part of a very powerful organization
translation.ko: - 고맙네 - 잘 들으세요 당신은 이 막강한 조직에서

translation.en: that'll finally allow you to shine.
Some people, by the way, would kill to be in a secret cabal.
translation.ko: 비밀 도당에 가입하기 위해 살인도 불사할 사람들이 있죠

translation.en: Professor, this is a crisis.
Jason Eccleston's death was sudden and unexpected.
You are the last, best hope at solving climate change.
translation.ko: 자네가 기후 변화를 해결할 우리의 마지막 희망이지

translation.en: You're an expert,
but you won't be doing this alone. MENTOR!
[in Boston accent] Professor Clark, I'm MENTOR.
[Lordington] MENTOR is the greatest supercomputer in the world.
It goes beyond artificial intelligence, because it contains a human soul.
translation.ko: 인간의 영혼을 갖고 있어서 인공 지능도 뛰어넘는다네

translation.en: [MENTOR] Basically, I'm wicked smart!
Unfortunately, our human soul was some Masshole from Boston
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 영혼의 주인은 매사추세츠에서 온 얼간이야

translation.en: who accidentally fell into the machine. Just our luck.
translation.ko: 실수로 기계 속에 떨어졌어 우리 팔자지

translation.en: [MENTOR] Hey, Shep.
You know what else I fell into?
Your Mom's vag.
-[chuckles] -Class act.
Is it possible to hide our dysfunction from the new guy?
translation.ko: - 일품이네 - 굳이 조직의 결점을 신입에게 공개해야 되겠나?

translation.en: You wanna talk about dysfunction? Y'all just kidnapped a Black man!
We've been kidnapping white men for years. We want to give you an opportunity as well.
translation.ko: 백인은 이미 많이 납치해서 자네한테도 기회를 주고 싶었어

translation.en: Forget about him.
Basically, we're the good guys. We want you to trust us.
translation.ko: 여기 다 선한 사람들이니까 우리를 믿어봐

translation.en: Why should I trust you, white man?
translation.ko: 왜 당신을 믿어야 하죠? 백인 아저씨?

translation.en: Whiter man?
-Older whiter man? -[scoffs]
-I don't know what to make out of you. -[hisses]
All other questions will be answered at your Initiato.
My what? Your Initiato!
Your initiation ritual.
Okay, okay. Look.
Y'all are crazy. I'm outta here.
No, no, no, no, no. You need to rest, for tomorrow you have Initiato,
translation.ko: 아니지, 자네는 쉬어야 해 내일 있을 이니시아토에서

translation.en: and you must "fuck us."
What? Hell, no!
I will not do that!
You must "fuck us" very hard.
He's saying "focus." He's Russian.
Yeah, "fuck us," what?
Yeah, okay. I'm out.
-Yes. -[metal clanks]
This will allow you to sleep, Professor.
[Hobart] What you talking about, sleep? Y'all got gas masks on?
Shit.
Hey, wait, listen. No, no, wait. Hold on.
Y'all are never gonna keep me prisoner…
Anecdotally, in my country, ATM is "ass-to-mouth" machine. Yeah.
translation.ko: 참고로 러시아에서 ATM은 '항문 자극 후 입 출입'을 뜻해

translation.en: Good morning, Pentaverate!
The time is 6 a.m. in New York, 12 p.m. in Dubrovnik.
I'm Maria Menounos for Pentaverate TV,
your one-stop shop for all things Pentaverate.
translation.ko: 펜타버릿의 모든 걸 한 방에 알려주는 채널이죠

translation.en: Help!
Is anybody out there?
[Maria] Inquiring minds want to know
who the potential new face in the Pentaverate is.
translation.ko: 펜타버릿의 새 가족이 누군지 궁금하실 겁니다

translation.en: Well, look no further than nuclear physicist Hobart Clark,
translation.ko: 주인공은 다름 아닌 핵물리학자 호바트 클라크로

translation.en: who joined us last nightafter his untimely death in the normie-world,
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 합류했습니다 이분을 바깥세상에서 요절하게 만든 원인은

translation.en: doing the "kiss the star" challenge,
the latest Internet craze where people are trying to kiss their own asshole!
translation.ko: 자기 항문에 키스해야 하는 최신 인터넷 유행입니다

translation.en: What? These mother…
Or as the kids are calling it,
a locally sourced rim job.
I'm Maria Menounos.
[Hobart] Dead?
"Fixated with the wrong star."
translation.ko: "클라크 교수의 죽음을 둘러싼 논란" '엉뚱한 스타를 관측하다'?

translation.en: Asshole? These motherf--
Good morning, Professor Clark! Do you like your quarters?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 클라크 교수님! 숙소는 맘에 드세요?

translation.en: What the fuck is this? Kissing my own asshole?
translation.ko: 이건 뭔 지랄이에요? 똥구멍에 키스를 해요?

translation.en: You say that as if it's a bad thing.
It was almost gonna be autoerotic asphyxiation,
but it wasn't, so it's a happy.
And what, am I a prisoner in my own room?
Just a formality till Katie in HR gets you your own security fob.
translation.ko: 인사팀 케이티가 보안 카드 만들 때까지만요

translation.en: Let me give you a tour. Come.
Oh no, Sasquatch!
No, no, no. Bad, bad Bigfoot. No, come. [kisses]
I'm sorry, Sasquatch?
Bullshit! That's a guy in a suit. That's all that is.
Okay, not a man in a suit.
Don't mind Sassy. He's just our guard dog.
translation.ko: 새시를 겁내지 마세요 우리 경비견일 뿐이에요

translation.en: But if you try to escape, he's gonna get ya. Right, Sassy?
translation.ko: 하지만 탈출을 시도하면 가만 안 둬요, 그렇지?

translation.en: -[Sasquatch breathes heavily] -Let's continue your tour.
Are you single?
-What? -What? Did you just ask me if I'm single?
Did I?
[woman over speaker] Sasquatch cleanup in Hall 3B.
You know, Reilly, we gotta get ourselves a big story,
and I'm talking Wayne Gretzky's wedding big!
"Canada's image quality is lower than the United States."
Is Canada fuzzy?
You know, Canada might be fuzzy. I don't know. I've never left Canada.
translation.ko: 그럴 수도 있겠네요 떠나본 적이 없어서 모르겠어요

translation.en: -[man] Go, Rex! -What's going on over there?
[Rex] Welcome to Truth Battle!
I'm Rex Smith here, sheeple!
Yeah, he's an Internet conspiracy guy. He is nuttier than a squirrel turd!
translation.ko: 인터넷 음모론자인데 다람쥐 똥보다도 맛이 갔어요

translation.en: I'll tell you the truth you won't get from the fake-news Hollywood elites,
translation.ko: 가짜 뉴스 판치는 할리우드보다 정확한 사실을 알려주지

translation.en: with their black helicopter chemtrails, from deep state FEMA camps
translation.ko: 시커먼 헬기 켐트레일 아래 딥 스테이트 FEMA 캠프에는

translation.en: that hide Hillary's emails about Benghazi,
translation.ko: 힐러리 클린턴의 벵가지 이메일이 숨겨져 있지

translation.en: written in the ancient tongue of the snake-people, the Illuminati.
translation.ko: 그 메일은 일루미나티 뱀족의 고대 언어로 작성됐다

translation.en: They take supple Christian men off the street
translation.ko: 유연한 크리스천 남성을 거리에서 납치한 뒤

translation.en: and force them into Canaanite ritual gay sex in coffins,
translation.ko: 관 속에 넣고 문란한 게이 섹스 의식을 치르게 하면

translation.en: while they dance naked giving each other lizard-man courtesy reach-arounds
translation.ko: 놈들은 그 안에서 발가벗고 난교 파티를 벌이는데

translation.en: as a sacrifice to the online meme Momo.
translation.ko: 모든 것이 온라인 밈 모모에게 바치는 제물이다

translation.en: -[crowd boos] -I'm Rex Smith.
-Stay awake and stay vigilant. -[crowd] Stay vigilant!
translation.ko: - 깨어 있어, 그리고 방심하지 마 - 방심하지 마!

translation.en: What a load of balloon juice!
Hey, I heard that!
Rex Smith speaks the truth, my friend.
He talks about the stuff that you and the lamestream media
wanna try and cover up.
Hi, I'm Anthony,
New Hampshire's number one conspiracy theorist.
I can tell you anything about the Illuminati, the Pentaverate, FIFA--
translation.ko: 내가 다 알려줄게 일루미나티, 펜타버릿, 피파…

translation.en: Whoa, I've never heard of the Pentaverate.
Yeah, the Pentaverate!
The five elite, so-called experts
that have been running the world since the black plague.
See that guy over there?
He's in the Pentaverate.
He's been surveilling me all morning.
The blind guy's been surveilling you all morning?
It's an act!
He's not blind. That's how they get ya!
Hey, buddy, why don't you make like a hockey player and get the puck out?
translation.ko: 그냥 아이스하키 선수처럼 퍽 꺼지는 게 어때?

translation.en: Okay. Take the blue pill. Go back to sleep.
translation.ko: 좋아, 파란 약 먹고 무지함 속에서 살아라

translation.en: Bye, sheeple.
Balloon juice.
Have you ever seen a baby pigeon?
That's true. I haven't seen a baby pigeon. That's the weirdest thing ever.
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 이상하네요 새끼를 본 적은 없어요

translation.en: No, me neither.
[Ken] "Forgo any foolish inquiries into the Pentaverate."
"Consider these words a warning."
Well, that's…
Holy jumpin'!
[Ken] What the…
Maybe that Yank was right. Maybe there is a Pentaverate.
translation.ko: 그 미국인 말이 맞나 봐요 펜타버릿이 존재하는 거예요

translation.en: See? I told you the Pentaverate is real.
You're a reporter. You've gotta do an exposé on them.
translation.ko: 당신 리포터잖아 폭로 방송을 해야 돼

translation.en: I can take you to their headquarters in New York City.
translation.ko: 내가 뉴욕에 있는 펜타버릿 본부에 데려다줄게

translation.en: [whispers] What do you have to lose?
If you break a story like the Pentaverate, you could get a job anywhere.
translation.ko: 펜타버릿 특종을 터뜨리면 어디든 취직할 수 있어요

translation.en: Anywhere?
I just want to get my job back at CACA.
Okay, I'll do it. That's what I'm talking about!
We can take my van, which is kind of like my home away from home.
translation.ko: 내 밴을 타고 갈 거야 이동식 주택이랄까

translation.en: Fair warning, the shocks are shot, there's no AC,
translation.ko: 미리 경고할게 서스펜션 나갔고, 에어컨 없고

translation.en: I do have a bed in the back, but we're gonna have to hot rack it.
translation.ko: 뒤에 침대가 있긴 한데 교대로 자야 할 거야

translation.en: I just got a secondhand chemical toilet that's a little bit on the fritz.
translation.ko: 중고 간이 화장실을 샀는데 상태가 살짝 메롱이야

translation.en: But other than that, it's perfect!
Come on! Hey, that Earth is flat. You know it.
translation.ko: 가자! 지구는 당연히 평면이지 "평면 지구 연합"

translation.en: Voilà.
You faked the moon landing.
[Patty] With the help of Stanley Kubrick, of course.
Patty, why me? Couldn't you get a different scientist?
translation.ko: 패티, 왜 나죠? 다른 과학자는 없었나요?

translation.en: Does the Lagrange Point Lens ring a bell? MENTOR?
[MENTOR] Oh, for fuck's sake! You just woke me from the best sex dream ever.
translation.ko: 이런, 빌어먹을! 최고의 섹스 꿈이었단 말이야

translation.en: I was raw dogging Alexa.
-I don't like that thing. -Yeah? Well, your mom likes my thing!
translation.ko: - 저 물건 싫어요 - 그래? 네 엄마는 내 물건 좋다더라

translation.en: You had the foresight to research the Lagrange Point Lens
translation.ko: 교수님은 특유의 선견지명으로 라그레인지 포인트 렌즈를 연구해 지구온난화를 막으려 했어요

translation.en: as a means to combat global warming.
With this lens,
translation.ko: 이 렌즈를 이용해 지구로 오는 태양열을 막으면

translation.en: we could shield the Earth from the sun's rays,
translation.ko: 이 렌즈를 이용해 지구로 오는 태양열을 막으면 "라그레인지 포인트 렌즈"

translation.en: lowering global temperature by four degrees.
I know, but it's still just a theory. Well, actually, we built it.
You engineered a 1,000 kilometer, concave, rotating Fresnel lens?
Not me personally, but yes.
translation.ko: - 제가 한 건 아니지만, 네 - 어떻게요?

translation.en: How? I wasn't able to crack cold fusion to power it.
You know, because I'm a failure.
We don't use the f-word around here.
translation.ko: 여기서 ㅅ 단어는 쓰면 안 돼요

translation.en: We call failure an early attempt at success.
translation.ko: 대신 성공을 향한 때 이른 시도라고 부르죠

translation.en: Professor, the future of humanity is at stake!
I mean, no pressure or anything.
If we could pull this off, global warming would be a thing of the past.
But I can't join an unaccountable institution.
translation.ko: 하지만 정체도 모르는 단체와 함께할 수는 없어요

translation.en: Then make it accountable!
Professor Clark, tonight at your Initiato,
take the key, join the Pentaverate,
and please, let me know if there's anything you need.
translation.ko: 그리고 필요한 게 있으면 나를 불러줘요

translation.en: I'm always here if you want to talk or mingle.
I know how hard it is to meet people when you work in a secret organization,
translation.ko: 비밀 조직에서 일하면서 사람 만나기가 쉽지 않죠

translation.en: and I know all about this place.
translation.ko: 난 이곳에 대해 모르는 게 없답니다

translation.en: I could be a really good asset. Mmm?
[MENTOR] Hey. [whistles] Yo.
I saw you checking out her shitter.
Close your eye. It's creepy as fuck.
[Anthony] There will be a conflagration, and those that are impure will be smoked.
translation.ko: "스트레이트 아웃 오브 로즈웰" 대화재가 발생하고 불순한 이들은 다 죽을 거야

translation.en: You know,
these people are sitting there telling me that birds are real.
translation.ko: "펜타버릿은 있다 쓰레기는 작살을 내버려!" 새가 진짜라고 지껄이는데 새는 진짜가 아니야!

translation.en: Birds aren't real!
translation.ko: 새가 진짜라고 지껄이는데 새는 진짜가 아니야! "뒷구멍도 취급합니다"

translation.en: It's a dream. It's a mirage that we all live in.
translation.ko: 꿈이지, 우리가 살고 있는 신기루랑 똑같아

translation.en: -[farts] -It's an agreement. It's a social contract, but I didn't fucking sign anything!
translation.ko: 합의이자 사회 계약인데 난 서명을 안 했는걸?

translation.en: Crack a window. It's gonna be bad.
That's what I get for dumpster-diving behind a seafood restaurant.
translation.ko: 해산물 레스토랑 쓰레기통에서 끼니를 해결해서 그래

translation.en: All right, tag team.
-What? -Move over. My turn. My turn to drive.
Get the wheel! Careful! Careful!
What's going on here?
All right, we're halfway to Niagara Falls.
We're about to pass my buddy Dick's hotel.
translation.ko: 곧 내 친구 딕의 호텔이 보일 거야

translation.en: Oh, there it is!
[Reilly] "Big Dick's Halfway Inn"? Really?
[Anthony] Yeah.
Big Dick suffers from gigantism. Hence, the nickname "Big Dick."
translation.ko: 빅 딕은 거인증을 앓고 있어 그래서 이름이 '빅 딕'이지

translation.en: And he's always wanted to have a hotel halfway between Toronto and Niagara Falls.
translation.ko: 토론토와 나이아가라폴스 사이 중간 지점에 호텔이 있으니까

translation.en: You know, Halfway Inn!
Yeah, Big Dick's Halfway Inn. Yeah.
Oh! Did you see there? They had a gift store. Pants are half off.
translation.ko: 아까 기념품 가게 봤어? 바지 가격도 반쯤 내렸대

translation.en: See? Reasonable prices. But that's just who Dick is.
translation.ko: 거봐, 합리적인 가격이지 딕이 그런 친구라니까

translation.en: I just hope people can see past his prolapsed anus.
translation.ko: 항문 탈장 가지고 편견 가지지 않았으면 좋겠어

translation.en: Let Initiato begin.
[Hobart] Whoa. Wait. Hold on. Wait a minute now. What the…
-Hold on! -[zipper unzips]
Hey, get your fucking hands off me, man. Hey!
Professor Clark, should you accept Initiato,
you shall join the Pentaverate,
as learned men have done for seven centuries.
Behold, before you is a choice.
Take the key, and you shall join us in protecting the world.
translation.ko: 열쇠를 집으면 우리와 함께 세상을 지킬 테고

translation.en: Take the pill,
and you shall end your life.
Those are my choices?
That's not a lot of wiggle room, huh?
I'm afraid not.
[Shep] You know, I think he'll take the key.
[Bruce] Nah, I bet you 100 work units he takes the pill.
[Mishu] What will be choice?
Will it be "key" or "peele"?
Come on, now.
Okay,
I choose…
to accept the Pentaverate.
The assent has been uttered!
Place the pill inside the key.
Now, let us begin Concludiato.
Well-done, Professor.
-Join us. -[indistinct chatter]
[Anthony] We're approaching the border.
You're gonna need these fake passports.
Fannie Mae,
Freddie Mac.
[inhales] Reilly, are you sure I'm doing the right thing?
I'm scared.
That's how you know it's the right thing, Ken.
We're gonna get your job back.
[Anthony] Cheese it. It's the cops. Be cool.
Nothing to see here. We're just going through.
translation.ko: 이상한 사람 아닙니다 그냥 통과할 거예요

translation.en: Just a little nose candy in my rectal vault, that's all.
translation.ko: 직장 속에 코카인 조금 넣어둔 게 다예요

translation.en: Nobody's El Chapo. Nobody's ISIS.
[agent] Passports please.
-All right. -[heroic music plays]
[Anthony] Let's expose the Pentaverate!
Holy jumpin'!
Canada is a little fuzzy, eh?
Look how clear it is!
♪ They're coming to America ♪
Lord, stop an arsehole. Look how clear it is!
translation.ko: 똥구멍이 진동할 정도예요 이렇게 선명할 수가!
